title: The Vampires Ange De La Mort, Meet The Parents
description: Unforeseen circumstances are forcing Ryder to tell his parents about his engagement to Tori before he’s ready. The werewolf pack maybe torn apart and brought crumbling to the feet of a new alpha if his parents cannot only accept their engagement, but also accept Tori as a new werewolf into their pack. With a murderer on the loose and taking the lives of people close to Tori, meeting the parents and turning into a werewolf for the first time has become the least of her worries. The only thing on Tori’s mind is catching the murderer and making him suffer a painful and agonizing death. This is the second book in BSM Stoneking's Ange De La Mort series. It is an Adults Only read!
author: B.S.M. Stoneking
